title: Support non-contiguous tensors for unary ops
body_html:
Extend support for non-contiguous tensors.

This PR will come in three parts

  1. Basic support to check correctness
  2. Removing the macros within CPUApplyUtils.h and potentially simplifying some of the code
  3. Producing perf oriented code by searching for opportunities to parallelize and using the vectorized code paths when possible.
body_text:

Basic support to check correctness
Removing the macros within CPUApplyUtils.h and potentially simplifying some of the code
Producing perf oriented code by searching for opportunities to parallelize and using the vectorized code paths when possible.
body:
Extend support for non-contiguous tensors.

This PR will come in three parts

1) Basic support to check correctness
2) Removing the macros within CPUApplyUtils.h and potentially simplifying some of the code
3) Producing perf oriented code by searching for opportunities to parallelize and using the vectorized code paths when possible.
